Commentary: Sohail Khan to Wright, 1 run, back of a length on middle stump, tucked away to the right of mid-on
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, strays onto the pads and that's a lovely shot, just a minimal flick of the wrist to clip it away smoothly to the left of the deep square leg fielder

Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, fullish outside off, that wasn't quite up there for the drive, but he adjusts beautifully, just slices downwards with a slightly open face to place it through backward point
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, length ball on off stump, and Shehzad plays across it, ends up whipping to mid-off with a lot of bottom hand
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, short outside off, pulled away to the left of deep square leg
Sohail Khan to Wright, no run, back of a length outside off, keeps a bit low to beat Wright's attempted back-foot push
Sohail Tanvir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, length ball on leg stump, clipped away to long leg
Sohail Tanvir to Wright, no run, full on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on
Sohail Tanvir to Wright, no run, fullish outside off, lets it come on for the checked push to backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Wright, no run, back of a length outside off, no footwork from Wright, just fishes at it, looking to push through the off side, and the ball beats his outside edge
Sohail Tanvir to Wright, no run, length ball angling away from off stump, left alone

Sohail Tanvir to Wright, FOUR, fullish on off stump and that's nicely done. Takes a step out of his crease and aims down the ground, over the umpire's head, swings full and free to pick up a two-bounce four
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, slower ball on off stump, and Shehzad shapes to drive and then checks himself to block
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, short on middle stump, pulled away to the right of deep square leg
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, slower ball, too short, too much width. Shehzad sets himself up on a stable base, waits, and flat-bats it through cover point
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, back of a length outside off, not much width, lets it come on and uses his wrists to cut it away to the right of third man
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, slower ball on middle stump, defended to midwicket
Sohail Khan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, shortish, not much width to cut, chops it down to backward point
Shakib Al Hasan to Wright, no run, back of a length, no turn at all, slides on with the round-arm angle and follows the batsman outside leg. Jabs it down to block into the off side

Shakib Al Hasan to Wright, 5 runs, down the track and he floats it up slower, angling into the pads. Clips it towards square leg and Tanvir comes in, picks up, and fires in a throw that's too wide of the keeper and runs away for four overthrows
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, slowly tossed up outside off, it's a touch short, and Shehzad rocks back and cuts it away to the backward point boundary
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, length ball on middle and leg, goes back and works it through backward square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Wright, no run, back of a length on leg stump, whipped towards deep square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Wright, 1 run, down the track and he slows it down, angling into the pads. Wright tucks it quietly into the leg side
Imad Wasim to Wright, OUT, down the track, looks to make room and Imad fires it wide of off stump. Wright reaches out to it, toe-ends it in the air to backward point
Wicket: ['LJ Wright c Mir Hamza b Imad Wasim 11 (12b 1x4 0x6) SR: 91.66']

Commentary: Imad Wasim to Pietersen, no run, full and flat on the pads, clipped towards backward square leg
Imad Wasim to Pietersen, 1 run, length ball on off stump, driven to long-off
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, makes a lot of room and he fires it in quicker on off stump, driven towards sweeper cover
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length on leg stump, saw him make room again. Chops it to backward point
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, whipped to deep square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, tossed up outside off and Shehzad is down the track to whip it away over wide mid-on and find the boundary to the left of deep midwicket
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, fired in flat and Shehzad takes a step back into his crease to shorten the length, and pulls it away to the square leg boundary

Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, this time he steps out too early and Shakib fires it in shorter, on of stump, turns away to take the outside edge as he looks to work it into the leg side, rolls into the backward point region
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length outside off, slapped into the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, down the track, fired into the pads, misses the flick and it hits him on the pad
Shakib Al Hasan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, tossed up on leg stump and Shehzad opens up to sweep it away to the long leg boundary
Usama Mir to Pietersen, 1 run, fullish on middle stump, clipped to mid-on, who's deep enough to allow a quick single
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up outside off, gets forward for a push into the point region
Usama Mir to Pietersen, 1 run, short and wide, slapped away to the left of sweeper cover

Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, back of a length outside off and that is a superb shot. Wasn't short enough for the full-blooded cut, so he leaned back, let it come on, and used the pace for a late-cut to the left of backward point
Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, length ball on off stump, whipped to deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Pietersen, 1 run, googly turning into the pads, worked towards short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Pietersen, 1 run, full outside off, driven to wide long-off
Imad Wasim to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, tossed up on off stump, driven to long-off
Imad Wasim to Pietersen, no run, quickish length ball on leg stump, shows the straight bat to defend towards straight midwicket
Imad Wasim to Pietersen, 2 runs, full, angling down leg, tickled away to the right of short fine leg
Imad Wasim to Pietersen, no run, length ball on off stump, pushes out too hard at the forward defensive, looking to play towards cover, and inside-edges into the midwicket region
Imad Wasim to Pietersen, SIX, down the track and that is a huge blow. Opens out to loft it high over long-off, he sliced that a little but almost by design, hitting with the turn

Usama Mir to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, bowled him! Was walking across his stumps to work the ball through the leg side, ended up shuffling too far, and the legbreak bowled him around his legs. An overconfident way to get out
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, tossed up outside off, opens his bat face to steer to backward point

Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length outside off, looks to stay inside the line to dab towards third man, and there's extra turn to take his outside edge, which is put down by the keeper
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, length ball on the pads, tucked away square of short fine leg
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Pietersen, 2 runs, full on middle and leg, whipped away to the right of mid-on
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, length ball wide of off, opens his bat face to guide it down to third man
Bopara to Pietersen, 1 leg bye, shortish offcutter, beats Pietersen's attempted pull and hits the top of his back thigh. Polite appeal for lbw
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, fullish on middle stump, clipped to deep square leg
Bopara to Pietersen, no run, length ball on leg stump, pushed down the ground, to the right of the bowler, who moves quickly in his follow-through to stop it
Bopara to Pietersen, 2 runs, slower ball on off stump, gets on the front foot to clip through midwicket
Bopara to Pietersen, 1 run, full on middle and leg, clipped to long-on
Usama Mir to Pietersen, SIX, tossed up on off stump and that's right in Pietersen's slot, clears his front leg and swings through the line to launch it over long-on
Usama Mir to Pietersen, no run, full on leg stump, clipped to straight midwicket
Usama Mir to Pietersen, 1 run, tossed up on a good length on off stump, gets forward to squeeze it away towards point
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, shortish outside off, sharp turn again to beat Sarfraz's cut
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, flighted and full on off stump, driven to the right of sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, on the pads, clipped towards short fine leg
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, in the blockhole on off stump, jabbed back to the bowler
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length close to off stump, dabbed to backward point
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, slower ball outside off, gets out of his crease, across his stumps, and works it gently into the vacant midwicket region
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
Bopara to Pietersen, 1 run, length ball on off stump, uses his wrists to play that down to long-on
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, length ball on off stump, gets his front leg out of the way and rolls his wrists over at the top of the bounce to play it to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, comes down the track and he bowls it quickly at his feet, poked back to the bowler
Usama Mir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, makes a bit of room by clearing his front leg, drives the middle-stump ball inside-out to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Pietersen, no run, quickish length ball on off and middle, blocked back to the bowler
Usama Mir to Pietersen, 2 runs, a bit slower, angling into leg stump, gets his front leg across and uses the pace to glance it through fine leg

Usama Mir to Pietersen, OUT, gone! Made too much room to drive inside-out, and he wasn't to the pitch of the ball. Turns away, he gets a thick edge, and Tanvir dives to his right to take a sharp catch at slip
Usama Mir to Elliott, no run, tossed up outside off, reaches out in front of his body to drive and ends up playing towards midwicket rather than cover as he intended
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short outside off, flat-batted to mid-off
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen c Sohail Tanvir b Usama Mir 26 (22b 0x4 2x6) SR: 118.18']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, back of a length on off stump, poked back to the bowler. Opened up to pull and then realised it wasn't short enough for that
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, in the blockhole, angling down leg. Looks to flick and misses, and it deflects off his pad into the off side
Sohail Khan to Elliott, 1 run, very full on off stump, looks to drive and ends up jabbing it behind the wicket, to the right of the keeper
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, length ball on off stump, looks to drive into the off side and ends up inside-edging towards fine leg
Sohail Khan to Elliott, no run, back of a length outside off, poked to backward point
Shakib Al Hasan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, fullish on middle stump, gets forward for an inside-out push into the covers
Shakib Al Hasan to Elliott, FOUR, tossed up on middle and leg, he gets down and paddles it fine past the keeper

Shakib Al Hasan to Elliott, OUT, he gets his man, finally. It was nicely tossed up on off stump, doesn't spin and came in with the arm. Elliott was looking to play across the line, fails to make contact and hits him on the front leg. Plumb!
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, tossed up on off stump and bunts it back to the bowler
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, slower through the air on off, fends in front of cover and scampers for a quick run.
Shakib Al Hasan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, quick and full on off, gets an inside edge onto his pad.
Wicket: ['GD Elliott lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 5 (5b 1x4 0x6) SR: 100.00']

Commentary: Sohail Khan to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, back of a length on middle stump, jumps across to work it to deep square leg
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full, a bit of swing in towards off stump, gets forward to drive to the left of short extra cover
Sohail Khan to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, length ball on off stump, pushed gently into the cover point region

Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, FOUR, yorker on leg stump, jams his bat down on it and gets a little bit of a tickle on it, enough to send it running away to the fine leg boundary. Unfortunate for the bowler, who bowled an excellent delivery
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, length ball on off stump, gets on the front foot for a push down to long-off
Sohail Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, length ball on middle stump, shows the full face for a push down to long-on
Shakib Al Hasan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, down the track, Shakib fires it into his feet. Whips it away to deep midwicket
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, length ball on middle and off, goes on the back foot to tuck it away to the right of square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, tossed up, angling down leg, swept to short fine leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, sweeps from a middle-and-leg now, gets an inside edge onto pad, rolls down to short fine leg again

Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, down the track, drives with the turn to the left of long-on, and that is excellent running., The fielder had some distance to cover, and Sarfraz took the first run in a hurry and then dived to complete the second

Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nawaz, OUT, length ball outside off, pushes to the right of cover and takes off for a single. Not a great idea, hit it towards the throwing arm of the fielder, and he hits the stumps direct at the non-striker's end to find Nawaz well short
Bopara to Anwar Ali, 1 run, full on leg stump, clipped to long-on
Bopara to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, slower ball wide of off, steers it away but can't beat the backward point fielder diving to his right

Bopara to Anwar Ali, no run, length ball on off stump, angling in. Lets it come on, looking to steer it backward of point, but he's denied room and he defends instead, the ball bouncing away behind the stumps
Bopara to Anwar Ali, no run, back of a length now, swiped to mid-on
Bopara to Anwar Ali, 2 runs, back of a length slower ball outside off, waits on it and dabs it down to the left of third man
Bopara to Anwar Ali, no run, yorker on leg stump, jabbed back to the bowler
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, shortish outside off, slapped straight to backward point. No chance of a single but the fielder, Imad, threw at the batrsman's end and conceded an overthrow
Sohail Tanvir to Anwar Ali, 1 run, back of a length on leg stump, cramps the batsman who's looking to create room for himself. Lets it come and dabs to short third man
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 2 runs, back of a length on off stump, forced off the back foot to the left of sweeper cover
Sohail Tanvir to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, shuffles across, exposes all his stumps. Tanvir follows him with a back-of-a-length ball and he tucks it quietly into the square leg region
Sohail Tanvir to Anwar Ali, 1 run, length ball on off stump, and Anwar clears his front leg and punches it away to the right of sweeper cover
